title: Returns – General Window
content: Most items are returnable within 30 days from delivery if in sellable condition with all accessories. Shipping fees are non-refundable.

title: Returns – Electronics
content: Electronics have a 30-day window from delivery. Opened electronics are returnable with all accessories; a category restocking fee may apply. Physical damage not caused by shipping is not eligible.

title: Restocking – Opened Electronics
content: Opened electronics incur a 10% restocking fee if returned within the valid window. Sealed electronics have no restocking fee.

title: Restocking – Apparel
content: Apparel with tags removed or light wear may be accepted within 30 days with a 5% restocking fee. New-with-tags apparel has no fee.

title: Restocking – Home & Kitchen
content: Opened home/kitchen items in good condition may incur a 5% restocking fee if within 30 days.

title: Refurbished – Window & Fee
content: Refurbished items have a 14-day return window. If opened, a 15% restocking fee applies. Cosmetic blemishes disclosed at purchase are not defects.

title: Shipping Fees – Non-Refundable
content: Original and expedited shipping fees are non-refundable unless the return is due to our error or a verified DOA case.

title: Damaged/Defective on Arrival (DOA)
content: Items damaged in transit or defective on arrival qualify for a free replacement or full refund if reported within 7 days of delivery.
